participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i'm currently in high school. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year.

participant_2.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i am very lonely. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.

content.text: I am an alone little girl who wants to make time stop.
